comments.raw_text: test-15 in test_websocket.html used to test this case.  pywebsocket doesn't seem to provide an API for it any more (see comments in file_test_websocket_wsh.py), so we disabled the test in bug 710345.   It would be nice to have coverage for this if we can figure out how to add it again.
comments.creator: jduell.mcbugs@gmail.com
